Hi guys,

We've created a custom module and would like to set some field values for that module from a html_HUbL template. I'm kind of stuck at this as I couldn't find any documentation about it.

This is how you get to the options in the VIsual Editor: <https://d.pr/v/p7GVUj>
Basically Module-> Styles -> Background -> Background Image . In the module this is the path to the setting that we use:
`module.styles.background.background_image.src`

So this is the code we've been using in order to set the background image from the html+HubL template:
`{% dnd_module path='../modules/ab-hero-section.module',`
            `content_alignment='center',`
            `headline = 'Powerful software to run and grow your landscape business',`
            `subheadline = 'Cut your costs. Boost your profit. Scale your business to $10 Million and beyond.',`
            `"styles" : {`
              
              `"background" : {`
              
                `"background_image" : {`
                    `"default" : {`
                      `"src" : "{{ get_asset_url('../images/your-image.jpg') }}",`
                      `"alt" : "TEST",`
                      `"width" : "1440",`
                      `"height" : "683"`
                  `}`

                `}`
                  
                
              `}`    
            `}` 
`%}`

Could anyone help with some guidance here please? We've been stuck here for quite a while and couldn't find any helpful documentation for this yet
